title: Let's plant a tree for every 100 salty players in League of Legends.

replies.body: Welp. Now that's we've covered NA's portion. on to the next region.
Is Fry Leela and Bender ok?
Everyone was fine, oxygen levels on Earth reached %90 in 10 seconds, Bender lit a cigar, the world is now a charred husk

> [{quoted}](name=HayRoss,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EEzl1mw3,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-02-08T14:39:32.304+0000)
>
> Everyone was fine, oxygen levels on Earth reached %90 in 10 seconds, Bender lit a cigar, the world is now a charred husk

Sounds like some shit from The Martian
Well I mean apparently it was the funniest movie of the year.
(Opens door as usual) *SYSTEM FAILURE. ACTIVATE SELF-EJECTION* ~BOOOM, YOUF***ED~
bender can have a cigar but Graves can't?!
Bender knows where to find any amount of hookers, cigars, and booze in this quadrant of the Galaxy

Trees have wood
Salty players all in wood division confirmed?
Trees are mostly carbon, like diamonds.
{{champion:44}}- Did someone say diamonds?
Point being that the same ratio of diamond players are salty.
https://youtu.be/zrzMhU_4m-g?t=2m43s

> Solo Queuer: 'Ello, I wish to register a complaint.

>Duo Queuer: Yes?

>Solo Queuer:   I wish to complain about this ADC what you queued with not half an hour ago from this very gamemode.

>Duo Queue'r: Oh yes, the, uh, the {{champion:67}} Main...What's,uh...What's wrong with it?

>Solo Queuer:  I'll tell you what's wrong with it, my lad. 'E's AFK, that's what's wrong with it!

>Duo Queue'r: No, no, 'e's uh,...he's stocking up on potions.

>Solo Queuer: Look, matey, I know an AFK ADC when I see one, and I'm looking at one right now.
Yes, Dragon270?  Hi...I've come to report that you've recently won something for that post.  Here it is.  It's the Internet.  Congradulations!
Haha I think everyone gets salty sometimes, it's a matter of whether it comes out in game :P
does salty just mean angry?  Seems like they are interchangeable now

I'd think of salty as more just being frustrated to the point that you start saying disparaging things about your teammates/balance/the enemies champion/Riot/the internet/kids these days/etc. You don't really have to be angry to hit salty, just be willing to say things. For me it doesn't happen much, but occasionally I get salty about games, I keep it to myself though
or in chat.
You guys are throwing salty around so much it is losing its meaning.
it's just a buzzword people use to appear cool and/or part of a community
we throw it around a lot because it tends to be accurate.
only if it mean. I get angry over dumb shit that waste my time and take the fun out the game for others, I guess I am salty too.
The gif that keeps on giffing
That's just 0.01% of the total
Dude this just gave me the idea.. Rito should build a life sized summoners rift.
Best LARP ever. Dibs on Draven.
Unfortunately, it'll fall flat after the harassment lawsuit from the DJ Sona player who was constantly being told to show players her you-know-whatsis.
Anyone else tempted to make a "Green Legend Ran" reference in regards to this, or is that just me?
We aren't running out of trees, actually in america we plant more trees then we cut down. Now 50 years ago we cut down a lot more trees then we planted, but we are growing a lot.

That is alot of fkn trees, like dayum.
to think thats only 1% of the salt amount
A little salt affects a lot of people?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
I don't know why but the term "salty" makes me feel old. Is this the new slang word for the young kids nowadays?
The idea itself isn't that bad though. Plant a tree for every **permabanned** player and you do something good for all of mankind.
that's too much trees bro...
